front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Framework of Blockchain-based Internet of Things (IoT) Data Management

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A framework of blockchain-based Internet of Things (IoT ) data management is defined in this standard. It identifies the common building blocks of the framework that blockchain enabled during IoT data lifecycle including data acquisition, processing, storage, analyzing, usage/exchange and obsoletion, and the interactions among these building blocks.
